overview: Noah Maffitt is currently EVP and General Manager for Live Nation’s global digital business. In this role he oversees the company’s online efforts as it expands into new areas of opportunity. Live Nation is the largest producer of live music concerts in the world, annually producing over 16,000 concerts for 1,500 artists in 57 countries. The company sells over 45 million concert tickets a year and expects to drive over 60 million unique visitors to livenation.com in 2008. Live Nation is transforming the concert business by expanding its concert platform into direct concert ticketing and building the industry’s first artist-to-fan vertically integrated concert platform. Prior to joining Live Nation, Noah held senior ecommerce roles with Office Depot and several other ecommerce companies. Previously, Noah worked with the United Nations, US Small Business Administration, and the White House

milestones.description: Joined Board of Directors of United Stationers, a fortune 500 public company
